title: Tile, "Mihrab tile (portion of a Prayer niche)", 13th century
description: Square fragment. Blue, with three planes of raised ornament consisting of Kufic and Neskhi characters and a scrolled stem with fruit, outlined with light reddish brown. Painted over-all pattern of delicate scrolls in pinkish white.

tombstone.epitaph: Tile, "Mihrab tile (portion of a Prayer niche)", 13th century. Siliceous- glazed earthenware. 1938-45-2.
